results.title: Metformin inhibits cell proliferation and ACTH secretion in AtT20 cells via regulating the MAPK pathway.
results.text_hl: These findings suggest @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as a potential drug for the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Pituitary_ACTH_Hypersecretion</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D047748 @@@Cushing's disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Sun Y, Cheng J, Nie D, Fang Q, Li C, Zhang Y. Metformin inhibits cell proliferation and ACTH secretion in AtT20 cells via regulating the MAPK pathway. Mol Cell Endocrinol. 2023 Dec 24;582():112140. PMID: 38147953
citations.BibTeX: @article{38147953, title={Metformin inhibits cell proliferation and ACTH secretion in AtT20 cells via regulating the MAPK pathway.}, author={Sun Y and Cheng J and Nie D and Fang Q and Li C and Zhang Y}, journal={Mol Cell Endocrinol}, volume={582}, pages={112140}}

results.title: Metformin suppresses growth and adrenocorticotrophic hormone secretion in mouse pituitary corticotroph tumor AtT20 cells.
results.text_hl: New medical treatments directly targeting the corticotroph cells and suppressing @GENE_POMC @GENE_18976 @@@ACTH@@@ secretion are urgently required. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ is a commonly used antidiabetic drug that has been widely used to control the @DISEASE_Hyperglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@ that occurs in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Pituitary_ACTH_Hypersecretion</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D047748 @@@CD@@@, which is secondary to both @CHEMICAL_Hydrocortisone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006854 @@@cortisol@@@ excess and pasireotide treatment.

citations.NLM: Jin K, Ruan L, Pu J, Zhong A, Wang F, Tan S, Huang H, Mu J, Yang G. Metformin suppresses growth and adrenocorticotrophic hormone secretion in mouse pituitary corticotroph tumor AtT20 cells. Mol Cell Endocrinol. 2018 Dec 15;478():53-61. PMID: 30025915
citations.BibTeX: @article{30025915, title={Metformin suppresses growth and adrenocorticotrophic hormone secretion in mouse pituitary corticotroph tumor AtT20 cells.}, author={Jin K and Ruan L and Pu J and Zhong A and Wang F and Tan S and Huang H and Mu J and Yang G}, journal={Mol Cell Endocrinol}, volume={478}, pages={53-61}}
